content.title: Map the Service Data
content.body:
1. From the Action Editor canvas, under Invoke Service, select Callback.
  2. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Mapping section, select Add Mapping.
    The Mapping Editor window appears.
  3. From the left pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Services > Service- RecipientStorage$Recipients$get, and select records{collection}.
  4. From the right pane of the Mapping Editor, expand Forms > frmRecipients > Segment-segPayeeList > masterdatamap, and select rowData{collection}.
  5. Expand both records{collection} and rowData{collection}.
